Get Property Records Table (DEPRECATED)

Source: R/get_property_records.R
get_property_records.Rd

Downloads property transaction records from Registro de Imoveis including capitals, cities, and regional aggregates data.

Usage

get_property_records(
  table = "capitals",
  cached = FALSE,
  quiet = FALSE,
  max_retries = 3L
)

Arguments

table

Character. One of "capitals", "capitals_transfers", "cities", "aggregates", or "aggregates_transfers".

cached

Logical. If TRUE, loads data from package cache.

quiet

Logical. If TRUE, suppresses progress messages.

max_retries

Integer. Maximum retry attempts. Defaults to 3.

Value

A tibble with property records data.

Deprecation

This function is deprecated since v0.4.0. Use get_dataset("property_records") instead.
